title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 201-1.12 - Suspension, reopening, renewal, modification, revocation, and enforcement of air permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 201-1.12 - Suspension, reopening, renewal, modification, revocation, and enforcement of air permits

State Regulations
(a) The department
may suspend, reopen, renew, modify or revoke a permit in accordance with the
procedures and provisions of Part 621 of this Title. (b) Failure to operate and maintain a
permitted emission source or air cleaning device in compliance with all
applicable requirements, permit conditions, other Parts of this Title and
existing laws shall be grounds for an enforcement action and sufficient reason
for the department to revoke or deny a permit or registration in accordance
with the procedures and provisions of Part 621 of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
201-1.12

Amended

New

York State Register February 10, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 06, eff. 2/24/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
